p: On June 5, 2020 dr. Tomisaku Kawasaki passed away at the age of 95: the news had a profound impact on many clinicians who dedicated their professional lives studying Kawasaki disease. He was a true model to all pediatricians, not only with regard to his clinical acumen but especially concerning his vibrant humanity. This article is sincerely dedicated to the memory of Tomisaku Kawasaki.
